name: Trimaran Capital Partners
overview: Trimaran Capital Partners is a private asset management firm, headquartered in New York. TCP has completed over 60 investments since 1995 and is investing Trimaran Fund II, which has committed capital in excess of $1 billion. Recent investments by Trimaran include Educational Services of America, Inc., the largest provider of day school services for children with special needs in the U.S., Urban Brands, Inc., a specialty apparel retailer that focuses on urban and ethnic customers, International Transmission Company, the nationâ€™s first and largest independent electric transmission operator, and Reddy Ice Group, Inc., the nationâ€™s largest manufacturer of packaged ice.

funding_round.source_description: Optimata Obtains $1.5 M For BioSimulation-Based Renewal Of Discontinued Cancer Drugs
